mapper.sql: ID, CHECK_ID, LEADER_JNUM, LEADER_NAME, CHECKED_JNUM, CHECKED_NAME, BASIC_POINTS, COM_POINTS, CREATE_TIME, STATE
mapper.select: select sum(t.basic_points)/count(1) "perBasic",sum(t.com_points)/count(1) "perCom",t.checked_jnum "jnum",t.checked_name "userName" from cs_month_checking t where check_id = ${checkId} group by t.checked_jnum,t.checked_name

select a.jnum "jnum",a.user_name "userName", nvl(b.basic_points,0) "basicPoints",nvl(b.com_points,0) "comPoints", nvl(b.total,0) "total", nvl(b.state,0) "state" from cs_users a left join cs_month_checking b on a.jnum = b.checked_jnum and b.check_id = ${checkId} and b.leader_jnum = '${jnum}' where a.position > 10 and a.state = 1 order by a.ord

select a.jnum as "jnum", a.user_name as "userName", a.leader_jnum as "leaderJnum", a.leader_name as "leaderName", nvl(to_char(b.basic_points),'-') as "basicPoints", nvl(to_char(b.com_points),'-') as "comPoints", nvl(to_char(b.total),'-') as "total" from v_emp_leader_rel a left join (select * from cs_month_checking where check_id = ${checkId}) b on a.jnum = b.checked_jnum and a.leader_jnum = b.leader_jnum
